title: Definitions
text:
1. Introduction
Optimization problem
\[
\begin{aligned}
\min_x \quad & f_0(x) \\
\text{s.t.} \quad & f_i(x) \le 0, \; i = 1, \ldots, m \\
& g_i(x) = 0, \; i = 1, \ldots, p
\end{aligned}
\]

( x ^n ): decision variable
( f_0 ): objective function
( f_i, g_i ): constraint functions



[2, 3, 4]
